sentences.en: ...one of the leading pioneers of photojournalism.
sentences.cn: …摄影新闻界的主要先驱之一。

sentences.en: a pioneer in the field of microsurgery
sentences.cn: 显微外科领域的创始人
开拓者应该有丰富的想象力.

sentences.en: Andy Canvin is a pioneer on the strange frontier of DNA genealogy.
sentences.cn: 安迪-卡文是DNA谱系学奇异前沿的先锋人物.

sentences.en: He acted as pioneer in proposing the method.
sentences.cn: 他是率先创导这一方法的人.

sentences.en: He is a pioneer in modern medical practice.
sentences.cn: 他是现代医学实践的先驱.

sentences.en: Henry Ford was a pioneer in the auto industry.
sentences.cn: 亨利·福特是汽车工业的先驱.

sentences.en: His Following the Colour Line was a pioneer study of prevailing racial attitudes, North and South.
sentences.cn: 他所著《遵循肤色界线》, 是对当时南方和北方流行的白人种族主义态度的开拓性的研究.

sentences.en: His pioneer group chose him as their leader.
sentences.cn: 他所在的少先队选他当了队长.

sentences.en: It is the word pioneer that arrests us.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是先驱者一词.

sentences.en: John Whitney was a pioneer of computer animation.
sentences.cn: 约翰·惠特尼是电脑动画的先驱。

sentences.en: My teacher and my classmates danced and sang at the Pioneer's meeting yesterday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 昨天下午我的老师和同学在少先队会上唱歌、跳舞.

sentences.en: She was a suffragette and a birth control pioneer.
sentences.cn: 她参加争取妇女选举权的运动，也是节育倡导者。

sentences.en: Since the pioneer days of the Curies, many more radioactive substances have been discovered.
sentences.cn: 自居里夫妇的开创性时代以来, 已经发现许多其他放射性物质.

sentences.en: That part of Northern Ohio where the Bently farms lay began to emerge from pioneer life.
sentences.cn: 北俄亥俄州本特利农场所在的那一部分,已开始从拓荒生涯中显露起来.

sentences.en: the early pioneers of the Dakota territory
sentences.cn: 达科他地区的早期拓荒者

sentences.en: The new cancer treatment was pioneered in the early eighties by Dr Sylvia Bannerjee.
sentences.cn: 这种新的癌症治疗方法是由西尔维娅·班纳基医生在80年代初期开创的。

sentences.en: What they lacked in speed those pioneer pilots made up for by flying only a few feet above the ground.
sentences.cn: 那些飞行员先驱通过离地仅几英尺的低空飞行，弥补了飞行速度的不足。

sentences.en: Will you please give your seat to this old woman . Young Pioneer?
sentences.cn: “你可以把你的座位让给这位老奶奶 吗 ?少先队员?”

trans.tran_en: one of the first people to travel to a new country or area and begin living there, farming etc
to be the first person to do, invent or use something
to be the first person to do, invent or use something
